extendedtooltip.setting.extendedLayout.d: 启用第二种布局，以便更有条理地显示工具提示。
extendedtooltip.setting.toolSystem.descr: 启用不同工具系统的工具提示
extendedtooltip.setting.toolSystem.anarc: 如果启用了无政府模式，则会显示一个指示器。
extendedtooltip.setting.toolSystem.netTo: 启用网络工具的工具提示。
显示正在使用的模式（直线、曲线等）。
在网络工具模式工具提示中添加海拔高度。
extendedtooltip.setting.displayMode.desc: 選擇什麼狀況下會顯示額外資訊
extendedtooltip.setting.displayMode.dela: 設定額外資訊的延遲顯示時間
extendedtooltip.setting.general.descript: 設定在遊戲內複數實體上顯示的額外資訊
extendedtooltip.setting.citizen.descript: 設定滑鼠懸停於市民上時顯示的額外資訊
extendedtooltip.setting.citizen.happines: Shows how happy the selected citizen currently is.
extendedtooltip.setting.citizen.educatio: Shows the education level of the selected citizen.
extendedtooltip.setting.citizen.type.des: Shows which type the selected citizen is.
extendedtooltip.setting.park.description: Manage tooltips that show information about parks & recreation sites.
extendedtooltip.setting.parking.descript: Manage tooltips that show information about parking facilities.
extendedtooltip.setting.parking.fees.des: Shows the current fees for parking.
extendedtooltip.setting.parking.capacity: Shows the occupied and free parking spaces.
extendedtooltip.setting.public_transport: Manage tooltips that show information about public transportation.
Shows the average waiting time for buildings with stations.
extendedtooltip.setting.road.description: Manage tooltips while hover over roads.
extendedtooltip.setting.road.length.desc: Shows the length of the selected road.
extendedtooltip.setting.road.upkeep.desc: Shows the upkeep costs of the selected road.
extendedtooltip.setting.education.descri: 設定教育用建物顯示的額外資訊
extendedtooltip.setting.education.studen: 顯示目前在校學生數量與可用學生名額
extendedtooltip.setting.growables.househ: 為選擇的單一建物中住戶標記不同的數字
顯示更加詳細的家庭資訊
extendedtooltip.setting.growables.wealth: 顯示該建物中住戶的平均財富
Shows the level of the selected building.
extendedtooltip.setting.growables.level_: Shows more info related to level of a building.
extendedtooltip.setting.growables.zone_i: Shows detailed zone information like name, type, level and others.
extendedtooltip.setting.growables.rent.d: Shows the current rent of the selected building.
extendedtooltip.setting.growables.balanc: Shows the current balance of the selected building.
extendedtooltip.setting.vehicle.descript: Manage tooltips while hover over vehicles like Cars, Trucks, Taxis and others.
extendedtooltip.setting.vehicle.state.de: Shows the current state of the selected vehicle.
extendedtooltip.setting.vehicle.driver.d: Shows driver information of the selected vehicle.
extendedtooltip.setting.vehicle.garbage_: Shows garbage capacity of the selected garbage trucks.
Shows mail capacity of the selected post vans.
extendedtooltip.setting.vehicle.passenge: Shows detailed information about the passengers of the selected vehicle.
extendedtooltip.setting.displayMode.hotk: The hotkey to trigger the tooltip to show.
extendedtooltip.setting.growables.descri: Manage tooltips for zone buildings like residentials, commercials, offices and insdustrials.
